article: National Day is coming. We Chinese will have a  seven-day  vacation. Lin Yan from Beijing heard that Hainan is very nice, so she is  _  a trip to Hainan with her parents for their vacation. She just finished  _  the Internet and got some information about Hainan. Hainan is really a good place to  have fun  , because there are many famous places,  _  Tianya Haijiao and Wanquan River. There are also beautiful  _  to walk down and seas to swim in. And the weather there is not too  _  and not too cold. Her parents  agreed with  her. They are flying to Hainan and staying there  _  five days. She hopes she will have a great time and forget all her problems. I think Li Yan is going to have a(n)  _  vacation!
